mapper.insert: INSERT INTO inquiry (inq_num, mem_id, theater_id, inq_type, inq_title, inq_content, inq_date, password) VALUES (#{inq_num}, #{mem_id}, #{theater_id}, #{inq_type}, #{inq_title}, #{inq_content}, #{inq_date}, #{password})
mapper.select: SELECT inq_num, mem_id, theater_id, inq_type, inq_title, inq_content, inq_date, password FROM inquiry WHERE inq_title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR mem_id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM inquiry WHERE inq_title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR mem_id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
